articles.author: Jennifer Rubin
articles.title: A government watchdog nailed Trump. Republicans cannot say no laws were broken.
articles.description: The GAO finds Trump has violated the Impoundment Control Act.
articles.content: And now, an independent agency has uncovered lawbreaking. Trumps action in withholding aid has now been cited as a violation of the Watergate-era Impoundment Control Act (ICA). The Post reports: The Government Accountability Office, a nonpartisan agency that … [+5605 chars]

articles.author: Steven Goff
articles.title: USWNT player Mallory Pugh is traded by Washington Spirit for four NWSL draft picks
articles.description: The Spirit seemed to see greater upside with its two other young national team players, Rose Lavelle and Andi Sullivan.
articles.content:
Washington also received the No. 13 and 17 picks overall and Sky Blues first-rounder in 2021. The cost, though, was Pugh, who in 2017 became the first player to skip college soccer altogether for an NWSL career.
Now 21, her career has not taken off as quickl… [+2070 chars]

articles.author: Rick Noack
articles.title: Trump's frustration with 'orange' lightbulbs echoes a common theme among the European far right
articles.description: Long before Trump railed against them at rallies, Europe's far right turned lightbulbs into a hotly debated political topic.
articles.content: For Europeans, however, his comments sounded like business as usual. Among Europes far-right populists, the fight against a de facto European Union ban on old lightbulbs has lasted years. When the E.U. phased out energy-inefficient incandescent lightbulbs in … [+3526 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: French far-right leader lays out plan to run for president
articles.description: French far-right leader Marine Le Pen isn't wasting time
articles.content: Le Pen reached the runoff in the 2017 election but lost badly to Emmanuel Macron, who is now in the midst of one of the most difficult periods of his presidency. In addition to the grassroots yellow vest movement thats seeking social and economic justice, Mac… [+683 chars]

articles.author: Hannah Knowles
articles.title: Nancy Pelosi gave out souvenir pens after sending impeachment to the Senate — and Republicans are fuming
articles.description: Critics said the Democratic leader undermined her past efforts to frame impeachment as a solemn constitutional duty rather than a political victory.
articles.content: Writing implements used to sign bills or executive orders are often handed out as keepsakes, and Pelosi followed a Washington tradition Wednesday when she used pen after pen to write tiny portions of her signature on articles of impeachment then gifted them t… [+5966 chars]
